headline: Workday Assembles World-Class Academic Minds for Its AI Advisory Board to Define the Future of Work in an Intelligent World
summary: Advisory Board Will Publish Cutting Edge Research, Provide Insights and Guidance to Help Workday and Its Customers Navigate the Evolving Impact of AIPLEASANTON, Calif., Jan. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --...
